name: Panda Doodle
description:
With Panda Doodle, we want you & your kids to experience how constraints actually boost creativity, help development of problem solving skills & open your mind to perspectives that you might have overlooked.

Designers have long recognized the power of limits to ignite creativity.(^)

Panda Doodle provides you different doodling tools but limits your choice of colors to Black & White only. Some people see black & white as limitations to creativity. We see them as boundaries to break.

From times, you might even realize that constraints might actually be your guide to appreciating the beauty of a particular perspective.

For instance, if your see the nature closely in black & white, you might see living treasures like the Giant Pandas, White Bengal Tigers & the Snow Leopard. Even we human cannot deny we are somehow more attracted to the black & white livings. Just flip through those kids books & see how Holsteins, Zebra & Killer Whale seem to appear more often than their ordinary counterparts…

How many beautiful Black & White items can you discover surrounding you? How will you draw colorful things in Black & White and make them even more attractive?


KEY FEATURES:
* Adjustable Pen Size
* Built-in Stamp Collection: Paw, Star, Ring, Hollow Square etc
* Rotate & Resize Stamps
* Quick Switch Between Black & White Pen & Stamp Colors
* Auto-Hiding Toolbar
* Save Drawing to Photo Album for Sharing
* Optimized for Retina Displays
* Full Screen Support on iPhone 5!


(^) REFERENCES:
